div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1566 Arndt (anc. Marathus), N. Phoenicia, 1947 Burial: after 112-111 B.C. Contents: 27 AE Aradus: 12 (as BMC 300 ff.; yrs. 129, 130, 148) Marathus: 15 (as BMC 34 ff.; yrs. 130, 142, 148) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, RN 1964, pp. 45-7
